PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[1] South Ferry-bound trains skip 137, 125, 116, 110 and 103 Sts</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Dec 15 - 18<br><br>For service<i> to</i> these stations, take the [1] to 96 St and transfer to a Van Cortlandt Park-bound [1].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [1] to 168 St* and transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].<br><br></font><i>*Transfer at 145 St with <a href=http://web.mta.info/metrocard/mcgtreng.htm#unlimited target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Unlimited Ride MetroCard</font></a>.<br></i><b><br>

PtSituationElement.Summary: TUNNEL RECONSTRUCTION

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TUNNEL RECONSTRUCTION</i> </b> <br clear=left><b>Weekend [2] [3] station closures and route changes</b>Until Summer 2018<br><br>No service at Park Place, Wall St, Clark St and Hoyt St; use nearby [4] [5] stations<br><br>No [2] [3] service between Manhattan and Brooklyn; take the [4] or [5] instead.<br><br>Weekend service map for <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/pdf/FF_Clark_St_web_map.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn</font></a><br><br></font>New timetables with Weekend Route Changes | [2] <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/pdf/t2cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>pdf</font></a> | [3] <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/pdf/t3cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>pdf</font></a> | [4] <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/pdf/t4cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>pdf</font></a> | [5] <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/pdf/t5cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>pdf</font></a><br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK REPLACEMENT</i><br clear=left>[4] Woodlawn-bound trains skip 161 St, 167 St, 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St</b>Weekend, 3:45 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Dec 16 - 17<br><br>For service<i> to </i>these stations, take the <b>[4]</b> to Burnside Av and transfer to a New Lots Av-bound <b>[4]</b>.<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [4] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a<br>Woodlawn-bound [4].<br><br><b><i>Alternate travel notes:<br></b>From</i> 161 St, take the [D] to <a href=http://web.mta.info/weekender/tileMap.html?staID=10210 target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>nearby </font></a> stations.<br><i>From</i> 176 St, </font>take the <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/bus/schedule/bronx/bx032cur.pdf target=blank><font color=#0000FF>Bx32</font></a> bus, <i>days and evenings</i>. Transfer to the [4] at Burnside Av.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td> [ad] <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay. </font></table><br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.Description: STATION IMPROVEMENTS [J] No trains between Crescent St and Jamaica Center [E] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>STATION IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[J] No trains between Crescent St and Jamaica Center[E] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service<br></b>Weekend, 3:45 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Dec 16 - 18<br><br>[J] Service operates between <b>Essex St*</b> and <b>Crescent St</b>.<br><br>[SB] Buses make all [J] stops between <b>Crescent St</b> and <b>121 St</b> and connect with the <br>[E] at <b>Jamaica-Van Wyck</b>.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle width=80%><tr><td><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b></font><td align=right>[TP]</table><br></font>For service between <b>Crescent St</b> and <b>121 St</b>, take a [SB] bus.<br> Transfer between [J] trains and [SB] buses at </font><b>Crescent St</b>.<br><br>For <b>Sutphin Blvd/Archer Av</b> and <b>Jamaica Center</b>, take the [E] instead.<br> Transfer between [E] trains and [SB] buses a</font>t <b>Jamaica-Van Wyck</b>.<br><br><font size=3><b><a style="cursor:pointer; text-decoration:underline;" onclick=ShowHide(1736740);>Show Shuttle Bus Stops</a></b></font><div id="1736740"; style="display:none;"><table class=plannedworkTableStyle border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=3 rules=rows frame=hsides><tr><td bgcolor=#FAF8CC><b>Station</b><td bgcolor=#FAF8CC><b>Shuttle Bus Stop</b><td bgcolor=#FAF8CC><b>Bus</b><tr><td>Crescent St [J]<td>Fulton St at Crescent St<td> &mdash;<tr><td rowspan=2>Cypress Hills<td>Jamaica Av at Hemlock St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>Crescent St at Jamaica Av (to Crescent St)<td> &mdash;<tr><td rowspan=2>75 St-Elderts Ln<td>Jamaica Av at 75 St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>Jamaica Av at Dexter Ct (to Crescent St)<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td rowspan=2>85 St-Forest Pkwy<td>Jamaica Av at 85 St (to Jamaica-Van Wyck)<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>Jamaica Av at 86 St (to Crescent St)<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>Woodhaven Blvd<td>Jamaica Av at Woodhaven Blvd<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>104 St<td>Jamaica Av at 104 St<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>111 St<td>Jamaica Av at 111 St<td><b>Q56</b><tr><td>121 St<td>Jamaica Av at 121 St<td><b>Q56</b></font><tr><td>Jamaica-Van Wyck [E] </font><td>Van Wyck Service Rd at 89 Av<td> &mdash;</table></div><br><br></font><b><i>Alternate travel note:<br></b></i>For JFK Airport <a href=http://www.panynj.gov/airports/jfk-airtrain.html target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>AirTrain</font></a>, use the [A] at Howard Beach-JFK via transfer at Broadway Junction.<br><br><b>Note:</b> Manhattan-bound platforms at 121 St and 104 St are closed for renovation.<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br><br></i></font><table class=plannedworkTableStyle border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td> [ad] <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay. </font></table><br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.Summary: TRACK MAINTENANCE [M] No trains running [J] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
PtSituationElement.Description: TRACK MAINTENANCE [M] No trains running [J] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[M] No trains running[J] trains and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service<br></b>Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Dec 15 - 18<br><br>[SB] Buses operate between <b>Metropolitan Av</b> and <b>Myrtle Av</b>, <i>making all station stops</i>.<br> Transfer between trains and [SB] buses at Myrtle Av.<br><br></font>[J] trains provide alternate service between <b>Myrtle Av</b> and <b>Essex St</b>.<br><br><font size=3><b><a style="cursor:pointer; PtSituationElement.Summary: TRACK MAINTENANCE [N] Trains run local in both directions between DeKalb Av and 59 St, Brooklyn
PtSituationElement.Description: TRACK MAINTENANCE [N] Trains run local in both directions between DeKalb Av and 59 St, Brooklyn
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[N] Trains run local in both directions between DeKalb Av and 59 St, Brooklyn</b></font>Weekend, 10 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Dec 15 - 18<br><br> Please allow additional travel time.<br><br><b>Reminder:</b> <a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/NightMap.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Late Night</font></a> local service operates as scheduled in Brooklyn.<br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.Summary: STATION ENHANCEMENTS [N] Coney Island-bound trains skip Broadway and 39 Av
PtSituationElement.Description: STATION ENHANCEMENTS [N] Coney Island-bound trains skip Broadway and 39 Av
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>STATION ENHANCEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[N] Coney Island-bound trains skip Broadway and 39 Av</b>Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, </font>Dec 15 - 18<br>For service <i>to</i> these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].<br><br><b>Note:</b> 30 Av and 36 Av are closed for renovation.<br><b><br>

PtSituationElement.Summary: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE [R] Trains run via the [Q] in both directions between DeKalb Av and Canal St

PtSituationElement.Summary: CAPITAL MAINTENANCE [SIR] No trains between Prince's Bay and Jefferson Av [SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service

PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b><i>CAPITAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[SIR] No trains between Prince's Bay and Jefferson Av[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service</b> <br>Weekend, 1 AM Sat to <b>4 AM </b>Mon, Dec 16 - 18<br><br>[SIR] Service operates in two sections:<br> 1. Between <b>Jefferson Av </b>and <b>St George Stations<br></b> 2.
